string.value: The Maple Administrator says that she has something to tell you.

You should take the Maple Administrator's advice and talk to Ericsson, the brave adventurer in Ossyria. #bGo see Ericsson#k in Orbis. Don't forget the Maple Administrator's advice to bring #b1 Dry Treat#k as a gift for his pet.
The Tale of Ericsson, the famous adventurer in Ossyria, is famous even amongst people who've never seen him. You brought a Dry Treat for his pet cat Nero and received his tale in return.

It's been tough collecting the tales I've requested, hasn't it? Let me inform you of one thing that might help you, #h0#. Maple World is filled with experienced heroes and they have more stories to tell than anyone else in the world.
Tales you acquire from them will be extremely valuable. So how about finding and talking to #bEricsson#k in Orbis?
Ericsson has a black cat named Nero, and I recommend you bring him 1 #bDry Treat#k as a gift for his pet.
It would be helpful to hear Ericsson's tales.
Arrrg! Oh, hey! I didn't see you there. What brings you here?\r\n#b#L0#I want to hear your tales.#l
Tales, huh? I don't have any to tell. I'm just enjoying life with my cat. Oh, Nero seems hungry.#b\r\n#L0#I brought a Dry Treat for your pet.#l

Thank you. Nero won't eat anything but Dry Treats. I want to reciprocate the kindness you have shown me... Do you just need to hear my tales?#b(Ericsson takes out a pencil and begins to scribble something.)#k\nI'm not a very articulate speaker and writing is much easier for me. I'm a little embarrassed, so please don't read it here.
Go on, now. I have to take Nero for a walk soon.
Oh, Nero seems hungry. What do I do? My Nero is a picky eater and won't go near anything but Dry Treats.
